description:
Update Container Border Styling

Remove white borders from container components and replace with a more subtle, modern border treatment.

Requirements:
- Locate all containers with white border styling
- Remove white borders or replace with low-contrast color (e.g., light gray, subtle shade of primary color)
- Remove rounded corners from border treatment
- Ensure borders blend seamlessly with surrounding elements
- Maintain visual hierarchy without relying on heavy borders
- Test border visibility across different background colors
- Verify design consistency across all container components
- Consider alternative visual separation methods (spacing, subtle shadows, background variations) if borders aren't necessary
title: Update Container Border Styling
